Unsupported Browser

Your browser does not support WebUSB, which is required for the web flasher to function.

How to Use the Web Flasher

  1. Download the both image's file using the "Download (Boot)" and "Download (System)" links above.
  2. Decompress the downloaded image file using a tool like 7-Zip.
  3. Put your device in fastboot mode (refer to your deviceâ€™s documentation if needed).
  4. Click the "Continue" button below to start the flashing process.
  5. Follow any on-screen prompts to complete the flashing process.

Connected Devices

Put your device in fastboot mode and use "Give access" to allow flashing.

After flashing the both images, click on "Reboot" to reboot your device.

Wait until read DONE (Right click and inspect for more information).
